GSD.description:
media: imx-jpeg: fix a bug of accessing array out of bounds

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit 20c8b90430c5d6c4a3936eaa7c35aac670581487. For more details please see the references link.
